name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
At Shenzhen Peacebird Children's Wear, if the sales of a store clerk does not reach 1,000 yuan a day, he will either be fined 5 yuan or copy the military regulations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 6, the owners of Greentown Fengqi Luming in Jinjiang District, Chengdu
announced a collective loan suspension.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
July 4, Jinan, Shandong.
A labor service payment form for off-campus personnel at Jinan University circulated online shows that the provincial government's living allowance for three international students in July was 29,000 yuan per person per month.
In response to this, Ms. Wang, the person in charge of Jinan University, explained that this picture was taken out of context and was not complete. In fact, the allowance for 30 months was paid according to regulations. The school is currently handling the matter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In Nanchong City, Sichuan Province, Pinduoduo's human resources provider "Yichang Ruibo Human Resources Service Co., Ltd." requires new employees to sign a letter of commitment to voluntarily give up the company's social security payment

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the evening of July 7, Dongtai, Jiangsu.
Traffic police were checking for drunk driving when a black SUV ran through the checkpoint, and more than a dozen people failed to stop it

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, a school issued a notice stating that the Ministry of Education had notified all provinces that scholarships would be distributed as usual in July.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
At noon on July 9, a fire broke out at the Guowei Electric Vehicle Factory in the Electric Vehicle Industrial Park in Xishan District, Wuxi City, Jiangsu Province. As of 17:00, black smoke was still coming out.
The main intersections were guarded by special police and police and could not be approached. The video was shot behind the Guowei Electric Vehicle Factory.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submissions
On July 9, under a video of the People's Liberation Army building a floating bridge released by China Military TV, many netizens expressed their dissatisfaction with the case of Huang Deyi, a villager from Zhenlin Village, Taonan City, Baicheng, Jilin, and his family being sentenced for privately building a floating bridge.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Memory of the times
On July 9, a netizen saw many signboards used during the epidemic piled up in the Wuhan High-speed Railway Station.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the evening of July 9, it was reported online that a wildfire broke out in Qingtian, Zhejiang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Subsequent update
Jinan University responded that the photo was not taken in full, the actual subsidy is 1,000/month, and the school has reported the rumor to the police

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 9, at the military training evening party of Tongji University in Shanghai, a student gave a talk show satirizing the dogma and formalism of military training, and was stopped by the instructor. Two criticism meetings were held in the afternoon and evening, educating students to "hold back what they shouldn't say" and "not spread the news".
According to the contributor, Tongji University's military training has been going on for a week, and this is the fourth conflict between students and instructors.
The students' demands are
"to stop the formalistic military training and let people speak the truth from their hearts"

(Since mobile phones are prohibited during military training, there is no on-site video or recording, but there is evidence to confirm the authenticity of the incident)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @0xzhaozhao You are right. Military training is not the responsibility of the army. However, the contributors may not be able to distinguish the difference clearly, so errors and omissions in the expression are inevitable.
